title: Intel to List Shares in Mobileye Unit; Move could value Mobileye at more than $50 billion, according to people familiar with the matter
text:
There are no guarantees Intel will ultimately follow through with an offering.

Mobileye, an Israeli company Intel acquired in 2017 for around $15 billion, specializes in chip-based camera systems that power automated driving features in cars.

(More to come.)

Write to Cara Lombardo at cara.lombardo@wsj.com and Corrie Driebusch at corrie.driebusch@wsj.com

Intel to List Shares in Mobileye Unit
